casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Fred C. SINK. No. 347P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. John Bryson, High Point, for Fred C. Sink. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 3rd day of July 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 3rd day of July 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
